00102       bool inactive() const {
00103        return INACTIVE==m_state;
00104       }
00105       bool active() const {
00106        return ACTIVE==m_state;
00107       }
00108       bool invalid() const {
00109        return INVALID==m_state;
00110       }

00112         return m_synch;
